results.name: Creamy Garlic Chicken
results.description: A rich and creamy garlic chicken dish that's easy to make and perfect for dinner.
results.instructions: 1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. 2. Saut√© the garlic in butter. 3. Add cream and simmer until thick. 4. Cook the chicken in the sauce until golden brown.

results.name: Peanut Butter Brownies
results.description: Fudgy brownies with a swirl of creamy peanut butter.
results.instructions: 1. Preheat oven and grease a baking pan. 2. Mix the brownie batter. 3. Swirl peanut butter into the batter. 4. Bake for 25 minutes and let cool.

results.name: Fruit Yogurt Parfait
results.description: Layered yogurt with granola and fresh berries for a refreshing snack.
results.instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. 2. Repeat layers as desired. 3. Serve chilled.
